product_meta.title: Sony Xperia XZ Premium - Unlocked Smartphone - 5.5", 64GB - Dual SIM - Pink (US Warranty)
product_meta.description:
Color:Pink| Style:Phone OnlyThe Xperia XZ Premium has the world's first Motion Eye memory stacked sensor, collects three times more information than any other smartphone camera and temporarily saves that information to ensure you capture amazingly clear and accurate details that otherwise would have been missed. 

With Super Slow Motion, record the fastest action and enjoy incredibly beautiful videos at 960 frames per second (FPS) of even the most difficult movements to capture. The XZ Premium's Predictive Capture saves the last four photos taken right before the shutter button is pressed so you can choose the perfect shot. 

The XZ Premium offers a truly immersive viewing experience with the first 4K HDR display in a smartphone. Watching entertainment on a smartphone has never been better—stream or binge watch your favorite videos on Amazon or other services that support 4K HDR. , the XZ Premium is equipped with the all-new MSM8998 processor, which is 50% faster and delivers 25% smoother real-time high-definition graphics than previous chips. It downloads and uploads three times faster than previous processors by using multiple LTE frequencies at the same time, resulting in fast, reliable streaming at the highest quality. 

The Xperia XZ Premium is a smartphone that opens your mind to new possibilities.
feature_bullets: World’s first memory-stacked Motion Eye image sensor with 960 FPS Super slow motion video and Predictive Capture capability

5.5” 4K HDR display with TRILUMINOS display for mobile, X-Reality for mobile, and Dynamic Contrast Enhancer. Front camera has 22mm wide-angle lens f2.0. Has wifi miracast and bluetooth 5.0 wireless connectivity
